TEXT.English: The Power of the American Dream:
TEXT.Chinese: 美国之梦:

TEXT.English: Additional happiness from running Republic, Capitalism and Free Market
TEXT.Chinese: 实行共和制、资本主义和自由市场时将获得额外的快乐点数

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn In All Cities
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市获得[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn

TEXT.English: The Power of Faith:
TEXT.Chinese: 安拉之剑:

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.Chinese: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities

TEXT.English: The Power of Juntas:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Juntas:

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: Great Generals can start Golden Ages

TEXT.English: The Power of Flower Wars:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Flower Wars:

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.Chinese: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
TEXT.Chinese: 文明摇篮:

TEXT.English: Receives a free technology for the first four technologies discovered
TEXT.Chinese: Receives a free technology for the first four technologies discovered

TEXT.English: The Power of Ethanol:
TEXT.Chinese: 清洁能源：

TEXT.English: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.Chinese: 把糖视为石油公司的消耗资源

TEXT.English: The Power of Bribery:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Bribery:

TEXT.English: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.Chinese: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.

TEXT.English: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
TEXT.Chinese: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:

TEXT.English: %s1 (%d2 gold)
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 (%d2 gold)

TEXT.English: None
TEXT.Chinese: None

TEXT.English: Bribing Barbarians
TEXT.Chinese: Bribing Barbarians

TEXT.English: The Power of Multiculturalism:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Multiculturalism:

TEXT.English: Immigrants bring [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] to your cities
TEXT.Chinese: Immigrants bring [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] to your cities

TEXT.English: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.

TEXT.English: The Power of Mercenaries:
TEXT.Chinese: 佣兵精锐:

TEXT.English: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for hurried units
TEXT.Chinese: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for hurried units

TEXT.English: The Power of Invention:
TEXT.Chinese: 天工开物:

TEXT.English: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance
TEXT.Chinese: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance

TEXT.English: The Power of the Liberator:
TEXT.Chinese: 和平解放：

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Chinese: 征服拉丁美洲城市后无动乱回合

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: The Power of the Pharaoh:
TEXT.Chinese: 神佑法老:

TEXT.English: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
TEXT.Chinese: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start

TEXT.English: The Power of Indirect Rule:
TEXT.Chinese: 殖民主义:

TEXT.English: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
TEXT.Chinese: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance

TEXT.English: The Power of Sovereignty:
TEXT.Chinese: 独立主权:

TEXT.English: Land units receive +10% additional strength within cultural borders
TEXT.Chinese: Land units receive +10% additional strength within cultural borders

TEXT.English: The Power of Diplomacy:
TEXT.Chinese: 折冲樽俎:

TEXT.English: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.Chinese: 减少外交惩罚时间，在国际会议更容易获得支持

TEXT.English: The Power of Doctrine:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Doctrine:

TEXT.English: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.Chinese: Units retain all their experience when upgraded

TEXT.English: The Power of Philosophy:
TEXT.Chinese: 理性光辉:

TEXT.English: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.Chinese: 古典时代结束之前历史伟人出现几率+150%

TEXT.English: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 希腊派出一支军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: The Power of Sanitation:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Sanitation:

TEXT.English: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Chinese: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era

TEXT.English: The Power of Trading Companies:
TEXT.Chinese: 贸易垄断:

TEXT.English: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
TEXT.Chinese: 获得双倍贸易公司的生产和收益

TEXT.English: The Power of Investiture:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Investiture:

TEXT.English: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.Chinese: Double construction speed of state religion buildings

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1的人口因旧大陆的大批移民涌入而迅速增长！

TEXT.English: The Power of Terraces:
TEXT.Chinese: 旱地农业:

TEXT.English: Mountains produce 2 food and 1 hammer
TEXT.Chinese: 山地产出2食物和1产能

TEXT.English: The Power of Purity:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Purity:

TEXT.English: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: The Power of Straits:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Straits:

TEXT.English: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core
TEXT.Chinese: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core

TEXT.English: The Power of Safaviyya:
TEXT.Chinese: 萨菲教团:

TEXT.English: Religious buildings produce +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Chinese: 每座宗教建筑+2[ICON_CULTURE]，+2[ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.English: The Power of Renaissance:
TEXT.Chinese: 文艺复兴:

TEXT.English: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.Chinese: 在工业时代之前，所有城市能够获得免费的专家。

TEXT.English: The Power of Modernization:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Modernization:

TEXT.English: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Chinese: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.English: The Power of Monsoons:
TEXT.Chinese: 丛林穿梭:

TEXT.English: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest
TEXT.Chinese: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest

TEXT.English: The Power of the Tropics:
TEXT.Chinese: 热带雨林:

TEXT.English: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.Chinese: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness

TEXT.English: The Power of Kobuksons:
TEXT.Chinese: 铁甲龟船:

TEXT.English: Free Drill I and Drill II promotions for all naval units
TEXT.Chinese: 海军单位自动晋升操练一级和操练二级

TEXT.English: The Power of Wealth:
TEXT.Chinese: 富甲天下:

TEXT.English: +1 commerce in every land plot
TEXT.Chinese: 每个陆地区块商业收入+1

TEXT.English: The Power of Astronomy:
TEXT.Chinese: 长纪年历:

TEXT.English: -40% research cost until beginning of the Middle Ages
TEXT.Chinese: 中古时代之前研究费用-40%

TEXT.English: The Power of Arid Agriculture:
TEXT.Chinese: 旱作农业：

TEXT.English: Can build farms on hills
TEXT.Chinese: 可以在丘陵上修建农场

TEXT.English: The Power of Terror:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Terror:

TEXT.English: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.Chinese: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest

TEXT.English: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.Chinese: 由于您的作战胜利使您的军队更为壮大！

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.Chinese: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!

TEXT.English: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.Chinese: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!

TEXT.English: Citizens of
TEXT.Chinese: 为避免同邻近城市一样被毁灭的命运，

TEXT.English: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.Chinese: 的居民决定开城投降！

TEXT.English: The Power of Irrigation:
TEXT.Chinese: 精耕细作:

TEXT.English: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.Chinese: 启蒙时代之前，建造在平原地块上提供的食物的设施食物产出+1

TEXT.English: The Power of Architecture:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Architecture:

TEXT.English: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.Chinese: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed

TEXT.English: The Power of Satrapy:
TEXT.Chinese: 帝国统治:

TEXT.English: No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture
TEXT.Chinese: No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture

TEXT.English: The Power of Navigation:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Navigation:

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles

TEXT.English: The Power of Golden Liberty:
TEXT.Chinese: 贵族联盟:

TEXT.English: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.Chinese: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages

TEXT.English: The Power of Exploration:
TEXT.Chinese: 乘风破浪:

TEXT.English: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
TEXT.Chinese: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies

TEXT.English: The Power of Infrastructure:
TEXT.Chinese: 基础建设:

TEXT.English: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
TEXT.Chinese: 建造已存在于首都中的建筑时，建造速度+30%

TEXT.English: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.Chinese: 一支军队已经被派出攻击%s1_civ_adjective！

TEXT.English: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马派出一支军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.Chinese: 您完美的胜利使您有能力派出另一支军团！

TEXT.English: The Power of General Winter:
TEXT.Chinese: 寒冬将军:

TEXT.English: Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn
TEXT.Chinese: 敌方单位在俄国境内战斗力每回合均会受损

TEXT.English: The Power of Discovery:
TEXT.Chinese: 探索未知:

TEXT.English: Naval units receive +2 movement points
TEXT.Chinese: 海军单位移动力+2

TEXT.English: The Power of Thalassocracy:
TEXT.Chinese: 海权主义:

TEXT.English: Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 为海滨地块和大洋地块提供额外的商业收益

TEXT.English: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 泰米尔派出一支军队来征服我们的文明！

TEXT.English: The Power of Father Governs Children:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Father Governs Children:

TEXT.English: +1 Commerce per Excess Happiness
TEXT.Chinese: +1 Commerce per Excess Happiness

TEXT.English: The Power of Missionaries:
TEXT.Chinese: 佛法无边:

TEXT.English: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.Chinese: 传教士数量没有限制，并可以进入外国领土

TEXT.English: The Power of Devshirme:
TEXT.Chinese: The Power of Devshirme:

TEXT.English: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
TEXT.Chinese: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions

TEXT.English: The Power of Raid:
TEXT.Chinese: 强取豪夺:

TEXT.English: Additional gold from pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
TEXT.Chinese: Additional gold from pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
